name: Barrelboy 22
description:
Barrelboy 22 is a game about barrels, exploding barrels! (And purple enemies).

Jump and move your way through areas of exploding objects and enemies. 

Controls

WASD/Left Thumbstick: Move player. 

Mouse/Arrow Keys/Right Thumbstick: Move the camera.

 Shift: Sprint. 

Left Mouse/Space Bar: Jump. 

1/Left Thumbstick Click: Toggle between first and third person. 

P/Esc/Gamepad Top Left: Pause.
